question: Which was the Napoleon last battle in which he was captured and exiled to St Helena?
hints: Battle was against British-led allied army and a Prussian army
It was Sunday, 18 June 1815 in Belgium
aboutAnswer:
The Battle of Waterloo was fought on Sunday, 18 June 1815 near Waterloo in Belgium, part of the United Kingdom of the Netherlands at the time.
A French army under the command of Napoleon Bonaparte was defeated by two of the armies of the Seventh Coalition: a British-led allied army under the command of the Duke of Wellington, and a Prussian army under the command of Field Marshal Blücher.
The battle marked the end of the Napoleonic Wars.
